name: artists_get_details
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool shazam.
Tool description: Identify any song. Discover, artists, lyrics, videos & playlists to create a song detector site/application such as shazam.com
API description: Retrieve detailed information about an artist using the Shazam API.

is_id.description: The unique identifier of the artist. This value can be obtained from various Shazam API endpoints, such as 'artist->adamid' from /search, /songs/v2/detect, or /songs/get-details, or 'artists->id' from /shazam-songs/get-details, /albums/get-details, or /albums/get-related-artist.

l.description: The language code for the response. Defaults to 'en-US'.
